References
==========
==========

References
Armbrust, M., Das, T., Xin, R., Zaharia, M. and others (2021) ‘Lakehouse: A new generation of open platforms that unify data warehousing and advanced analytics’, CIDR Conference 2021.
Arora, M., Gupta, A. and Singh, V. (2021) ‘Robust data validation in schema-on-read architectures’, Information Systems, 99, p.101754.
Beltagy, I., Peters, M. and Cohan, A. (2020) ‘Longformer: The long-document transformer’, arXiv, arXiv:2004.05150.
Chen, R., Zhang, X. and Liu, Q. (2020) ‘A modular and scalable architecture for big data pipelines in cloud-native environments’, Journal of Grid Computing, 18(3), pp.461–476.
Chen, X., et al. (2021) ‘TABERT: Pretraining for joint understanding of textual and tabular data’, arXiv. Available at: .
DocTR (2021) Document Text Recognition Library. GitHub Repository. Available at: .
Gao, J., Chen, X. and Wang, W. (2022) ‘Efficient document page classification for table extraction’, In: Proceedings of the Web Conference (WWW), pp.2184–2195.
GRI (2023) GRI Standards. Global Reporting Initiative.
IPCC (2021) AR6 Climate Change 2021: The Physical Science Basis.
Kotsantonis, S., Pinney, C. and Serafeim, G. (2016) ‘ESG integration in investment management’, Journal of Applied Corporate Finance, 28(2), pp.10–16.
KPMG (2022) Key global trends in sustainability reporting. Available at:
https://kpmg.com/xx/en/our-insights/esg/survey-of-sustainability-reporting-2022/global-trends.html.
Larrucea, X., Santamaria, I., Colomo-Palacios, R. and Ebert, C. (2021) ‘Data governance for AI: Status, challenges, and opportunities’, IEEE Software, 38(5), pp.50–57.
Liu, Y., et al. (2019) ‘RoBERTa: A robustly optimized BERT pretraining approach’, arXiv. Available at:
Mao, Y., Ramesh, S., Liang, S., et al. (2021) ‘DocFormer: End-to-end transformer for document understanding’, In: Proceedings of ICCV 2021.
McKinsey & Company (2022) Diversity wins: How inclusion matters.
McKinsey & Company (2023) Closing the gap: Navigating the ambition-action gap in sustainability. Available at:
https://perspectives.se.com/blog-stream/closing-the-gap-navigating-the-ambition-action-gap-in-sustainability.
OECD (2020) G20/OECD Principles of Corporate Governance.
Ratner, A., Bach, S.H., Ehrenberg, H., Fries, J., Wu, S. and Ré, C. (2020) ‘Snorkel: Rapid training data creation with weak supervision’, The VLDB Journal, 29, pp.709–730.

Ryan, A., Rogers, D., Xin, R.S. and Armbrust, M. (2023) ‘Apache Iceberg: A high-performance table format for large analytical datasets’, In: CIDR 2023.
Touvron, H., Lavril, T., Izacard, G., et al. (2023) ‘LLaMA: Open and efficient foundation language models’, arXiv, arXiv:2302.13971.
